Observed the same exception when copying local -> local, so changing the summary.
The file is actually copied OK, just the error dialog is annyoing.

I've changed the SystemView call to use SystemAdapterHelpers.getAdapter(o, this) in order to have to IAdapter check before the cast.  I'm not why the problem would occur since remote files are IAdaptable but nevertheless this check should avoid the exception.
